translations: v.使倾斜（tilt 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Amy tilted her wine in her glass with a luxurious sigh.
sentences.translation: 埃米把杯中的葡萄酒斜向一边，适意地叹了口气。

sentences.sentence: Leonard tilted his chair back on two legs and stretched his long body.
sentences.translation: 伦纳德把他的椅子向后斜着撑在两条脚上，然后舒展他修长的身躯。

sentences.sentence: She tilted her head to one side.
